name: Marathon
description: Experience the thrill of a marathon in the heart of New York City.
mechanics: Participants must complete the course within the allocated time.
prizes: Top 3 finishers receive cash prizes and medals.
eventSchedule: Check-in starts at 6 AM; race begins at 7 AM.

name: Triathlon
description: Challenge yourself with a triathlon in San Francisco.
mechanics: Athletes must complete swimming, cycling, and running sections in sequence.
prizes: Top 3 finishers receive trophies and sponsored prizes.
eventSchedule: Check-in starts at 5 AM; race begins at 6 AM.
